AikidoTheWayOfHarmony.name: Aikido (Japan) - The Way of Harmony
AikidoTheWayOfHarmony.summary: Josette trains intensively with the heir to the highest-ranking Sensei in this strictly defensive art. Wading through the difficult code of Japanese etiquette while searching for Budo - the martial way - on the Samurai's path, she encounters a martial art created in the aftermath of the World War II as an answer to violence.

GoWarriorAikido.name: Go Warrior: Aikido
GoWarriorAikido.summary: Roland Osborne explores Aikido in Tokyo, learning how its circular motions redirect an opponent's energy to neutralize them without causing harm.

TheHeartOfAikido.name: The heart of Aikido - Hikitsuchi Michio 10th Dan (full documentary)
TheHeartOfAikido.summary: Explore the life and teachings of Aikido 10th Dan Hikitsuchi Michio. This full documentary details their journey with O-Sensei Morihei Ueshiba, showcasing techniques and principles. Witness demonstrations of Aikido forms and the spiritual significance behind the practice.
